metaphorAnnotationRecords.linguisticMetaphor: از نگاه دینی نیز صرف نظر از نوشته های عمومی، با نگاهی دقیقابعادفقركاویده نشده است.
metaphorAnnotationRecords.isiDescription: Abductive engine output; targetFrame: Is currently equal to targetConceptSubDomain;targetConceptDomain: Target concept domain defined by abduction; targetConceptSubDomain: Target concept subdomain defined by abduction ; sourceFrame: Source frame proposed by abduction ; sourceConceptSubDomain: Source subdomain proposed by abduction ; targetFrameElementSentence: List of words denoting the target found by abduction; sourceFrameElementSentence: List of words denoting the source found by abduction; annotationMappings: Target-Source mapping structures. isiAbductiveExplanation: Target-Source mapping (metaphor interpretation) as logical form found by abduction.
